template.name: package

#!/bin/sh # /** # * Copyright (c) 2013-Now http://jeesite.com All rights reserved. # * No deletion without permission, or be held responsible to law. # * # * Author: ThinkGem@163.com # */ echo "" echo "[信息] 打包安装工程，生成jar包文件。" echo ""
mvn -v echo ""
cd .. mvn clean install -Dmaven.test.skip=true -Ppackage
cd bin
